attributes.action: New car on the road - old one off - HGV's night travel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we work on the principle that the country will not get any bigger and the road network around our cities and between them is at saturation point perhaps we should consider that if we buy a new car we should taken one off the road.  This has worked perfectly well in Singapore. Each address in the electoral register should be permitted up to 2 vehicles.  The government should encourage hauliers to travel at night by reduced taxation
